Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Authorizes John Hawley to receive certain credit under section 384-d of the retirement and social security law
Summary: Authorizes Village of Bath police officer John Hawley to receive certain credit under section 384-d of the retirement and social security law for past service with the Steuben County Sheriff's Department.
ActClause: AN ACT to authorize John Hawley to receive certain credit under section 384-d of the retirement and social security law
